legacy.full_text: How is the #energy shortage affecting the world's effort to cut #carbon emissions? What's crucial to China-US cooperation on #climate issues? #ToThePoint talks with Ding Zhongli, an expert on #climatechange and vice-chairman of the NPC Standing Committee. #COP26 https://t.co/deQdTpLbMP
A clear and informative piece of work on climate change from my colleague. Watch this if you would like to know about the opportunities and challenges faced by current global climate cooperation.

legacy.description: Author, 'When China Rules the World', columnist, broadcaster, speaker. Chair of @HariVeriahTrust
legacy.name: Martin Jacques

legacy.full_text: Sinophobia seriously distorts the West's coverage of COP26. China has half the emissions per capita of the US. The US accounts for 75% of all greenhouse gas emissions ever. China has 50% of the world's EVs, provides 80% of the world's solar panels and has 400,000 electric buses.

legacy.full_text: Reading Western media you may wrongly believe that #Xinjiang is all about cotton and "camps". You won’t see how the working opportunities and labor situation are leading people to better lives. Watch this video that looks at 3 companies in a thriving economy. #DiscoverXinjiang https://t.co/CrqiK8HCC4

In this 3rd episode, my colleague and I look at #Xinjiang's amazing food and how it's creating job opportunities for the local people. The tomatoes in the film are sweeter and juicier than any other tomatoes I had in my life. Everyone should visit XJ and try it!

*China has supplied the world with 4…

legacy.description: Author, 'When China Rules the World', columnist, broadcaster, speaker. Chair of @HariVeriahTrust
legacy.name: Martin Jacques

legacy.full_text:
* China's vaccine count is over 1.9bn. Over 70% of the population have had two doses

*China has supplied the world with 45% of that total. It has provided 1 dose to the world for every 2 doses given in China

* By Aug 4, China had shipped 770m doses to the world, 7x that of US

legacy.full_text: The anti-China rhetoric on forced sterilizations has offended this doctor in Xinjiang. The false narrative against China's maternity health practices does not portray reality in #Xinjiang. Watch this video to hear what Western media isn’t telling you. #DiscoverXinjiang https://t.co/LGqpRTMayx

Here is our second #Xinjiang film. Dr. Obul was filled angry when we brought up Adrian Zenz’s claim during the interview. The false accusation is almost unfair to her as a senior Uygur obstetrician. I hope people could get to know the real story from her message.

legacy.full_text: Follow China Daily through one of China's most discussed regions – Xinjiang. In this episode, we look at the mechanization of the cotton industry in Xinjiang and the weak allegations surrounding the unsubstantiated controversy. #DiscoverXinjiang #Xinjiangcotton https://t.co/24MHeF1Qfk
Me and my amazing colleges took a 10 days trip to #Xinjiang. This documentary is the first film we produced from our trip. I'm really glad to showcase the amazing changes happening in my hometown.

legacy.description: Writer on Latin America and the US cold war against China. @NoColdWar international committee & @NCWBritain. Socialist, anti-racist, feminist, anti-imperialist.
legacy.name: Fiona Edwards

legacy.full_text:
China's response to an outbreak of around 100 covid19 cases in Nanjing is zero tolerance- aiming to crush the virus.

Mass testing of 9 million people, travel restrictions, quarantine in affected neighbourhoods & public spaces closed in at risk districts.

Zero covid is possible.
